description:
**Fix Overview**:

To resolve the win32k elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-21346), please follow these steps:

1. Download the appropriate update package for your Windows version from the official Microsoft Update Catalog.
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2: [Download KB5034765](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034765)
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2: [Download KB5034765](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034765)
   - For Windows 11 Version 21H2: [Download KB5034766](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034766)

2. Install the updates on your system.
3. Restart your computer to apply the changes.

**Details**:
This update fixes a vulnerability in the win32k component, which could allow an attacker to elevate their privileges on the affected system. Installing the update addresses the risk associated with this vulnerability.

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is one of the affected versions (Windows 11 Versions 21H2, 22H2, or 23H2) before proceeding with the installation.
- Backup critical data before applying the updates.
